title: El Pingüino Pablo y el Gigante de Piedra

content.translation: Pablo is a very serious penguin. He always walks with his chest out, like an important official. One day, Pablo explores a rocky coast, far from his home. He is looking for a great adventure to make him famous.
content.text: Pablo es un pingüino muy serio. Siempre camina con el pecho afuera, como un oficial importante. Un día, Pablo explora una costa rocosa, lejos de su casa. Busca una gran aventura para ser famoso.

content.alt: Un pingüino serio caminando por una playa rocosa.
content.prompt: A charming children's storybook illustration of a cute penguin, Pablo, waddling with a very serious and important expression. He has his chest puffed out proudly. The background is a misty, rocky shoreline with smooth, grey stones. The art style is simple, with soft colors and friendly character design. No text in the image.

content.translation: Suddenly, Pablo stops. He sees a gigantic cliff. At the top, a large rock juts out, looking just like a giant's chin. Below it, the wide cliff face looks like a huge stone breast. 'Wow!' says Pablo. 'It is a sleeping stone giant! This is my discovery!'
content.text: De repente, Pablo se detiene. Ve un acantilado gigante. En la parte de arriba, una gran roca sobresale, parece la barbilla de un gigante. Debajo, la ancha pared del acantilado parece un enorme pecho de piedra. «¡Guau!», dice Pablo. «¡Es un gigante de piedra dormido! ¡Este es mi descubrimiento!»

content.alt: El pingüino Pablo mirando asombrado un acantilado que parece un gigante dormido.
content.prompt: A beautiful children's book illustration. In the foreground, the small penguin Pablo stands with his flipper pointing, his beak open in awe. Before him looms a massive, misty cliff face that is subtly shaped like the profile of a sleeping giant's chest and chin. The scale difference is dramatic. The lighting is soft and magical. The style is warm and painterly. No text in the image.

content.translation: Pablo has a magnificent idea. 'I must be a photographer! I will take a picture and show it to the world!' But he needs help. He finds his friend, Fifi the seal, playing in the water. 'Fifi, come quickly! I found a stone giant! We need to take a picture!' Fifi is very excited and agrees to help.
content.text: Pablo tiene una idea magnífica. «¡Debo ser un fotógrafo! ¡Voy a tomar una foto para mostrarla al mundo!». Pero necesita ayuda. Encuentra a su amiga, la foca Fifi, jugando en el agua. «¡Fifi, ven rápido! ¡Encontré un gigante de piedra! ¡Necesitamos tomar una foto!». Fifi está muy emocionada y acepta ayudar.

content.translation: Next, they see Alberto the albatross resting on a rock. 'Alberto!' shouts Pablo with his official voice. 'We are on an important mission to photograph a giant.' Alberto, impressed, joins them immediately. Soon, they also convince Carlos the grumpy crab to join the expedition.
content.text: Luego, ven al albatros Alberto descansando en una roca. «¡Alberto!», grita Pablo con su voz de oficial. «Estamos en una misión importante para fotografiar a un gigante». Alberto, impresionado, se une a ellos inmediatamente. Pronto, también convencen al cangrejo Carlos, que es un poco gruñón, para unirse a la expedición.

content.alt: El pingüino, la foca, el albatros y el cangrejo marchando juntos en una misión.
content.prompt: A delightful and comical children's book illustration showing the team on their quest. Pablo the penguin leads with a determined look, followed by a happy Fifi the seal, a majestic Alberto the albatross flying just overhead, and a grumpy Carlos the crab scuttling sideways. They are walking along a path with the sea on one side. The style is bright, cheerful, and full of personality. No text in the image.

content.translation: The group arrives at the giant cliff. 'It's huge!' says Fifi. 'How do we take a picture?' asks Alberto. 'I don't have a camera,' says Carlos, the crab. They start to argue. They don't know what to do.
content.text: El grupo llega al acantilado gigante. «¡Es enorme!», dice Fifi. «¿Cómo tomamos una foto?», pregunta Alberto. «Yo no tengo una cámara», dice Carlos, el cangrejo. Empiezan a discutir. No saben qué hacer.

content.alt: Los cuatro amigos animales discutiendo al pie del acantilado gigante.
content.prompt: A dynamic children's storybook illustration of the four animal friends at the base of the massive cliff. Pablo the penguin has his flippers on his hips, looking frustrated. Fifi the seal looks confused. Alberto the albatross is shrugging his wings in the air. Carlos the crab is waving his claws angrily. The scene is full of comical, expressive emotion. The style is colorful and engaging. No text in the image.

content.translation: Suddenly, a soft voice says, 'What is all this noise?' It is Lidia the owl, who is sitting on a high branch. Pablo proudly explains, 'We are here to photograph the stone giant!' Lidia looks at the cliff and then at the friends. She smiles wisely.
content.text: De repente, una voz suave dice: «¿Qué es todo este ruido?». Es la lechuza Lidia, que está sentada en una rama alta. Pablo explica con orgullo: «¡Estamos aquí para fotografiar al gigante de piedra!» Lidia mira el acantilado y luego a los amigos. Ella sonríe con sabiduría.

content.translation: 'My dear friends,' says Lidia gently. 'There is no giant here. This is a very old mountain. The great law of nature is that the wind and the rain slowly change the rocks. For thousands of years, they have carved this shape. It looks like a giant, but it is only a beautiful illusion.'
content.text: «Mis queridos amigos», dice Lidia con calma. «Aquí no hay ningún gigante. Esta es una montaña muy vieja. La gran ley de la naturaleza es que el viento y la lluvia cambian las rocas lentamente. Durante miles de años, han tallado esta forma. Parece un gigante, pero es solo una bonita ilusión».

content.alt: La sabia lechuza Lidia explicando la verdad sobre la roca a los otros animales.
content.prompt: A warm and gentle children's book illustration. A wise, friendly owl with large, kind eyes sits on a tree branch. Below her, Pablo the penguin, Fifi the seal, Alberto the albatross, and Carlos the crab are looking up. Their expressions are changing from confusion to surprise and understanding. The scene is lit by a soft, warm light, creating a peaceful and educational atmosphere. The style is reassuring and sweet. No text in the image.

content.translation: Pablo, Fifi, Alberto, and Carlos look at the rock again. Now they see it clearly: it's just a rock, very beautiful and very old. Pablo feels a little embarrassed, but his friends are happy. 'It doesn't matter,' says Fifi. 'We had a great adventure together!' And they all agree.
content.text: Pablo, Fifi, Alberto y Carlos miran la roca otra vez. Ahora la ven con claridad: es solo una roca, muy bonita y muy antigua. Pablo se siente un poco avergonzado, pero sus amigos están contentos. «No importa», dice Fifi. «¡Tuvimos una gran aventura juntos!». Y todos están de acuerdo.

moral.translation: It is better to observe carefully and understand the truth before creating a big story.
moral.text: Moraleja: Es mejor observar con cuidado y entender la verdad antes de crear una gran historia.
